Elizabeth Anyakoha (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ prọfesọ mbụ nke agụmakwụkwọ akụnaụba ụlọ na Naịjirịa. A maara Anyakoha maka ihe ịrịba ama ya n'ọhịa nke agụmakwụkwọ akụnaụba ụlọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 1979.

Ọ nwetara M.Ed na Ph.D ya na 1982 na 1986, n'otu n'otu, na Curriculum Studies na Mahadum Naijiria dị na Nsukka. Anyakoha emepụtala ihe ọmụmụ na ihe nkuzi maka akụnaụba ụlọ na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ọrụ aka ndị ọzọ na ọkwa agụmakwụkwọ dị iche iche (primary, secondary na tertiary) na Naịjirịa.
Anyakoha emebiela ihe ndabere n'ihe gbasara ndekọ ịbụ onye mbụ n'ihe niile ọ na-eme
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba nke Mmụta Ọzụzụ, Mahadum Naịjirịa

Anyakoha bụ onye guzobere Home Economics Journal, Home Economics Research Association of Nigeria (HERAN) na 2000 na Family and child Development Centre. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ikike ma n'ime obodo Mahadum na ndị otu ọha dị iche iche

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye a n'ahụ ihe na National University commission (NUC), Nigeria Education Research and Development Commission (NERDC), National Commission for Colleges of Education (NCCE), UNICEF, UNESCO, UNDP, Central Bank of NIgeria (CBN) na World Bank.
Otu prọfesọ nke agụmakwụkwọ akụ na ụba ụlọ kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ka gọọmentị mepụta ihe na akụnaụba ụlọ iji kwalite nkà ụmụ amaala iji mepụta ohere ọrụ.
